casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Calvin BENNETT Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided May 8, 2019

W. Theodore Koch III, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Linda F. Currie-Zeffiro, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 187 Conn. App. 847, 204 A.3d 49 (2019), is denied.
